attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that a special dispensation should be made so as persons on benefits who sit on Housing Association Boards can be paid a modest amount other than expenses without affecting their benefit payments. This would then encourage more involvement on HA boards by residents.

rejection.details: The title must be a call to action not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
